directions: Place ice in a blender and pour in coconut water; add cherries, watermelon cubes, and sweetener. Cover and blend until slushy, about 1 minute. Pour into 2 glasses to serve.
ingredients: 1/2 cup coconut water (liquid from inside coconut)
1 teaspoon granular sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®) (optional)
title: Watermelon Summertime Slush
